indiaCardData.name: Invoices
indiaCardData.description: Efficiently Create and Send professional business invoices, track payment statuses, establish due dates, apply reverse charge as necessary, and access a range of additional functionalities to streamline financial management and enhance business operations.

indiaCardData.name: Unlimited user access
indiaCardData.description: Grant unlimited user access with customizable roles, to enhanced security and also allowing you to set restrictions based on  Date range, CIDR ranges.

indiaCardData.name: GST Compliances
indiaCardData.description: Create GST invoice, view GST reports, direct filing, check filing status and reconcile transactions with the GST portal.

indiaCardData.name: Inventory Management
indiaCardData.description: Maintain inventory of Product, and Services in group, items and variant too, easy search with barcode, and real-time inventory reports.

indiaCardData.name: IP Security
indiaCardData.description: Implementing IP security in Giddh ensures restricted access to authorized IP addresses, and protecting sensitive financial data. It ensures compliance, reduces the risk of breaches, and enhances overall control and monitoring of system access for better security.
